amendatorysection.catchline: Long-term care services and supports; department; limitation on addition to medicaid managed care program.
amendatorysection.para: Until July 1, 2021, the department shall not add long-term care services and supports to the medicaid managed care program. For purposes of this section, long-term care services and supports includes services of a skilled nursing facility, a nursing facility, and an assisted-living facility and home and community-based services.
